title: Mario Balotelli on the end of rant from Nice team-mate Valentin Eysseric who blasts him for ‘letting his head drop’ too easily
text:
EFL THAT'S NOT NICE Mario Balotelli on the end of rant from Nice team-mate Valentin Eysseric who blasts him for ‘letting his head drop’ too easily 
Former Man City and Liverpool striker gets it in the neck from French midfielder who claims he is 'amazing' By ALEX TERRELL
